snippet: Federated Department Stores will convert all 21 Bullock's chain stores to Macy's, bringing the famous name to Southern California for the first time. The change, disclosed today in The Los Angeles Times, will erase the Bullock's name 88 years afte...
lead_paragraph: Federated Department Stores will convert all 21 Bullock's chain stores to Macy's, bringing the famous name to Southern California for the first time. The change, disclosed today in The Los Angeles Times, will erase the Bullock's name 88 years after the first store opened. Federated, based in Cincinnati, said the change was part of a national plan to further raise the profile of its main chains: Macy's, Bloomingdale's and Stern's.
